com.samsung.multiscreen

Class Search

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.multiscreen.Search

  • public class Search
extends Object
    Provides management facilities for discovering MultiScreen-enabled Services.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Search.OnBleFoundListener
      Interface to listen for TV found events using BLE.
      static interface  Search.OnServiceFoundListener
      Interface to listen for service found events.
      static interface  Search.OnServiceLostListener
      Interface to listen for service lost events.
      static interface  Search.OnStartListener
      Interface to listen for search start events.
      static interface  Search.OnStopListener
      Interface to listen for search stop events.

    • Method Detail

      • isSearching

        public boolean isSearching()
        Returns if any search is in progress.
        Returns:
        true, if a search is in progress. false, otherwise.

      • isSearchingBle

        public boolean isSearchingBle()
        Returns if any BLE search is in progress.
        Returns:
        true, if a search is in progress. false, otherwise.

      • start

        public boolean start()
        Start the search process.
        Returns:
        true, if started. false, otherwise.

      • start

        public boolean start(Boolean showStandbyDevices)
        Start the search process.
        Parameters:
        showStandbyDevices - optional argument to stop showing standby devices.
        Returns:
        true, if started. false, otherwise.

      • stop

        public boolean stop()
        Stop the search process.
        Returns:
        true, if stopped. false, otherwise.

      • clearStandbyDeviceList

        Clears standby device list from the device.

        public boolean isSupportBle()
        Checks whether BLE is supported.
        Returns:
        true, if stopped. false, otherwise.

        public boolean startUsingBle()
        Start the ble search process.
        Returns:
        true, if started. false, otherwise.

      • stopUsingBle

        public boolean stopUsingBle()
        Stop the search process.
        Returns:
        true, if stopped. false, otherwise.

      • getServices

        public List<Service> getServices()
        The list of services found during the search process.
        Returns:
        a list of services found

      • addProvider

        public void addProvider(SearchProvider provider)
        Add a SearchProvider to the list of available search providers that search will scan for services. If a provider is not specified, then the MDNSSearchProvider will be used.
        Parameters:
        provider - a search provider to include in a scan for services

      • removeProvider

        public boolean removeProvider(SearchProvider provider)
        Removes the specified search provider
        Parameters:
        provider - the search provider to remove
        Returns:
        true, if the search provider is removed immediately. false, otherwise.

      • removeAllProviders

        public void removeAllProviders()
        Remove all search providers.

        public void setOnStartListener(Search.OnStartListener onStartListener)
        Set the listener for start (search) events.

        Set the listener for stop (search) events.

        public void setOnServiceFoundListener(Search.OnServiceFoundListener onServiceFoundListener)

        public void setOnBleFoundListener(Search.OnBleFoundListener onBleFoundListener)
        Set the listener for service found events using BLE.
        Parameters:
        onBleFoundListener - the listener to invoke on service found with BLE events
